verbs.description: [ARG0: US officials] [V: said] [ARG2: to multiple media outlets] [ARG1: that President Donald Trump was considering the idea of a leisurely activity with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un , including golfing , if things go well at the US - North Korean summit] .

US officials said to multiple media outlets that President Donald Trump [V: was] considering the idea of a leisurely activity with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un , including golfing , if things go well at the US - North Korean summit .

US officials said to multiple media outlets that [ARG0: President Donald Trump] was [V: considering] [ARG1: the idea of a leisurely activity with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un , including golfing] , [ARGM-ADV: if things go well at the US - North Korean summit] .

US officials said to multiple media outlets that President Donald Trump was considering the idea of [ARG2: a leisurely activity with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] , [V: including] [ARG1: golfing] , if things go well at the US - North Korean summit .

US officials said to multiple media outlets that President Donald Trump was considering the idea of a leisurely activity with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un , including golfing , if [ARG1: things] [V: go] [ARGM-MNR: well] [ARGM-LOC: at the US - North Korean summit] .
